exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy, women who are planning to get pregnant and those unwilling to use contraception
exclusion.label: met
met
exclusion.evidence: Splenic flecture/pancreatic tail mass was also seen on CT, likely diverticular abscess given the patients recent likely history of diverticulitis

exclusion.criterion: Use of corticosteroids within the past 4 weeks

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass, and presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She has been experiencing mid-abdominal pain radiating to the left flank over the last few weeks leading up to admission.
